channel.title: Biden on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Biden on FinanClub

item.title: Biden's Economic Decoupling Plan With China Won't Work
item.description: Introduction The economic relationship between the United States and China has been fraught with tension for some time now, with both countries imposing tariffs and other trade restrictions on each other. Recently, President Biden’s administration has taken steps towards what they call “economic decoupling” with China, a policy aimed at reducing the US’s dependence on China’s economy.
